name: Carmen | Vocabulary for distance
description:
I was born in Florencia Caqueta, Colombia.  I've lived in many cities, i'm currently based in Rosario, Argentina. In my productions I am interested in exploring autobiographical aspects of the migratory experience. 

Migrating entails saying goodbye to a part of one's own history that becomes more porous and fragile with the passage of time.
I try to reconstruct it through drawing, I let the line evoke separations, photographs of my childhood, bodies that become landscape, mythical and nostalgic beings. 

This series is a draft of images to name the distance.  Dedicated to those who make nomadism and permanent search a home.
